+6 07 5557351 [fabu@utm.my](mailto:fabu@utm.my) * [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/built.surveyUTM/) * [X](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) * [Instagram](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) * [RSS](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) * [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/built.surveyUTM/) * [X](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) * [Instagram](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) * [RSS](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/postgraduate-resources#) **Postgraduate Resources** * [Academic & Financial Related Resources (Forms & Guidelines)](https://sps.utm.my/academic-related-resources/) * [Academic Policy & Guidelines](https://sps.utm.my/policy-guidelines-v2/) * [Postgraduate Thesis Formatting](https://sps.utm.my/thesis-formatting-2023/) * [Postgraduate Forms](https://amd.utm.my/postgraduate-form/) * [Submission Research Proposal Form](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Research-Proposal-Submission-Form-01.07.2020.pdf) * [UTM Academic Calendar](https://amd.utm.my/academic-calendar/) * [Work Schedule for Postgraduate Programme](https://amd.utm.my/work-schedule/) * [Class Schedule for Research Methodology Course](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Research-Methodology-UBEP6013_20242025_1-1.pdf) ##### Online Submission of Research Proposal For 1st Assessment (Proposal Evaluation) Checklist & Procedure for Online Submission of Research Proposal For First Assessment (Proposal Evaluation) during movement control order / Covid-19 pandemic period. Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying (FABU) will implement Online Proposal Evaluation for PhD and Master of Philosophy student during movement control order and COVID-19 pandemic. The research proposal/thesis can be submitted via online submission with these steps : | | | | | --- | --- | --- | | **The steps and checklists to Online Submission of Research Proposal** **for 1st ASSESSMENT (PROPOSAL EVALUATION)** | | | | **No.** | **Description** | **Action** | | 1. | Supervisor nominate the list of Panels to be endorsed by Faculty Meetings (JKA (PS)). | Supervisor | | 2. | Notice of list of approval panels to Supervisor.

Notice of submission period of research proposal report to student. | PG office | | 3. | Proposal or thesis follows UTM thesis format.

[https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Thesis-manual-26.5.2020\_full.pdf](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Thesis-manual-26.5.2020_full.pdf) | Student | | 4. | **Complete** **all relevant forms and documents :**

a. [Research-Proposal-Submission-Form](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Research-Proposal-Submission-Form-01.07.2020.pdf)

b. Student Consent Form for Conducting 1st Assessment Online & Guideline For Proposal Evaluation Session

c. Turnitin Report verified by Supervisor | Student

Supervisor | | 5. | All forms need to be signed. Supervisor may sign the form digitally or write a written consent via email or other credible means to the student. | Student & Supervisor | | 6. | Submit the proposal together with all related signed forms (or with supervisor’s written consent) to **[pgfabu](mailto:pgfabu@utm.my)
****[@utm.my](mailto:pgfabu@utm.my)
** and [**nurhafizah@utm.my**](mailto:nurhafizah@utm.my) | Student | ##### Online Submission of Thesis For Viva Voce Checklist & Procedure for Online Submission of Thesis For Oral Examination (Viva Voce) during movement control order / Covid-19 pandemic period. Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying (FABU) will implement Online Oral Examination (Viva Voce) for PhD and Master of Philosophy student during movement control order and COVID-19 pandemic. The thesis can be submitted via online submission through these steps : | | | | | --- | --- | --- | | **The steps and checklists of Online Submission of Thesis for VIVA VOCE** | | | | **No.** | **Description** | **Action** | | 1. | Notification for thesis submission (NHT) through GSMS (3 months prior submission) – SV will nominate the examiners and submit to PG Office for endorsement by JKA (PS) and JAPSU.

**Note :**

Requirement – pass the University Elective Course and Research Methodology Course

Kindly discuss with your SV before submit the NHT | Student

Supervisor

PG Office | | 2. | Thesis follows UTM thesis format

[https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Thesis-manual-26.5.2020\_full.pdf](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Thesis-manual-26.5.2020_full.pdf) | Student | | 3. | Email the softcopy of thesis (full thesis and separate by chapter) to Programme Coordinator (PC) for running turnitin. | Student

PC | | 4. | **Complete all relevant** **forms** **and documents.** **The forms are available at** **[https://sps.utm.my/academic-related-resources/](https://sps.utm.my/academic-related-resources/)
** | Student | | | [a.](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/checklistthesissubmission.pdf)
[Checklist for Thesis Submission](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/checklistthesissubmission.pdf)

[b. Thesis Submission Form 1 (UTM.SPS.B](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Borang-Penyerahan-Tesis.pdf)
[(PSP)/05/2018 – Pind.1/2018)](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Borang-Penyerahan-Tesis.pdf)

[c.](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Borang-Penyerahan-Tesis-2.pdf)

[d.](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Plagiarism-Agreement.pdf)
 [](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Plagiarism-Agreement.pdf)
[Plagiarism Agreement](https://sps.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Plagiarism-Agreement.pdf)

e. Turnitin Report – verified by Programme Coordinator

f. List of Publication – verified by Programme Coordnator

g. \*A debt release letter for the oral exam (viva voce) from Bursary Office (**[bendahari-ukp@utm.my](mailto:bendahari-ukp@utm.my)
**)

h. Student Consent Form for Conducting Oral Examination Online & Guideline For VIVA-VOCE Session

**Note :**

\*Oral (Viva-Voce) Examination Fees for Doctoral Degree and Master (Research) will be charged once the student confirmed to submit their thesis.

A debt release letter will be endorsed by Bursary Office after the student paid the viva voce fees and clear all the debts.

– Doctoral Degree :    RM2,500.00

– Master (Research) : RM1,500.00 | | | 5. | All forms need to be signed. Supervisor may sign the form digitally or write a written consent via email or other credible means to the student. | Student
